Workflow.name: Joiner Birthright LDAP

Variable.name: identityDisplayName
Variable.Description:
The displayName of the identity being updated.
Query for this using a projection query and fall back to the name.

Variable.name: flow
Variable.Description: What type of LCM flow is this

Variable.name: plan
Variable.Description: The provisioning plan which is built during the workflow.

Variable.name: source
Variable.Description:
String version of sailpoint.object.Source to indicate
where the request originated. Defaults to LCM.

Variable.name: trace
Variable.Description:
Used for debugging this workflow and when set to true trace
will be sent to stdout.

Variable.name: project
Variable.Description: ProvisioningProject which is just a compiled version of the ProvisioningPlan.

Workflow.Description: Enable birthright accounts when an employee joins the company.

Step.name: Create Birthright Plan
Step.Description: Process the user that joined and create plan for the user. Only create AD account for new "employees".

Step.name: Compile Project
Step.Description:
Compile the provisioning plan into a provisioning project.
If you need to pass in provisioner options like "noFiltering"
or "noRoleDeprovisioning" you must pass them as explicit
arguments to the call.
The evaluation options "requester" and "source" are commonly
set here.
You can also pass things into the Template and Field scripts by
defining Args in this step.
